name: Africa Animals: Kids, Girls and toddler games 2+
name_original: Africa Animals: Kids, Girls and toddler games 2+
description:
Care for details and focus on younger players make “Africa” an educating, relaxing application for your children.

Designed for children aged 3 and up, it is simple to use.

Features:

- Compatible with all iPhone, iPad, iPod devices
- Very high resolution images for exploiting the features of RETINA displays
- Drawings can be printed
- Audio effects and background music
- 4 Games: Matching Game, Stickers, Colors and Music for Kids
- Continuously updated with new characters and levels

Try the free version now. All levels will be unlocked in the complete version.

++ STICKERS ++
- 50 stickers to stick
- 12 albums to complete with lots of characters
- Simplified albums
- Complex albums for older children
- Use your imagination and artistic flair to position the stickers as you want

++ MATCHING GAME ++
- 40 characters to discover
- 4 levels of difficulty
- Simple and user-friendly even for the youngest children
- improve your memory

++ DRAWINGS TO COLOR IN ++
- Simplified use of colors
- 20 drawings to color in
- 30 colors
- Drawings can be printed and colored in by hand
- Save your drawings

++ MUSIC ++
- Play with sounds and instruments of Africa

SECURITY FOR YOUR CHILDREN
MagisterApp creates high quality apps for children.No third party advertising. This means no nasty surprises or deceiving advertisements.
Millions of parents trust MagisterApp. Read more and tell us what you think on www.facebook.com/MagisterApp.
Have fun!
